    • Method Detail

      • checkForSubstitutions

        protected static Token checkForSubstitutions(Token currentToken,
                                             java.lang.String prevToken)
        Replaces all JavaDecaf method calls with the Java equivalents. To avoid nesting when used with Java method calls such as System.out.System.out.println, checks value of previous token. If it's a full stop, it's likely a Java method call, so no replacement occurs.
        Parameters:
        currentToken - the token in question
        prevToken - the previous token image
        Returns:
        the token, substituted or otherwise

      • checkIndentation

        public static void checkIndentation(JDCParser parser,
                                    Token t,
                                    SimpleNode node)
        Checks the indentation level and generate a warning if not correctly indented.
        Parameters:
        parser - the parser in use
        t - the indented token
        node - the current node

      • getComment

        public static Token getComment(Token token,
                               SimpleNode node)
        Finds a token's attached comment and return it
        Parameters:
        token - the token in question
        Returns:
        the comment, or null if none is present

      • hasComment

        public static boolean hasComment(Token token)
        Checks whether a token contains a comment in its special tokens.
        Parameters:
        token - the token in question
        Returns:
        true if there is a comment, otherwise false

      • indent

        protected static Token indent(Token t,
                              SimpleNode node)
        Indents a token the correct number of times if it appears within a JavaDecaf class
        Parameters:
        t - the token to indent
        node - the node within which the token appears
        Returns:
        the indented token

      • isComment

        public static boolean isComment(Token specialToken)
        Checks to see whether a special token is a comment
        Parameters:
        specialToken - the special token in question
        Returns:
        true if the token is a comment, otherwise false

      • isNewline

        public static boolean isNewline(Token t)
        Iterates through specialTokens to see if there is a newline at the end. Will return true if specialToken is null
        Parameters:
        t - the token in question
        Returns:
        true if the token contains a newline specialToken or a null specialToken, otherwise false

      • isNewline

        public static boolean isNewline(Token t,
                                SimpleNode n)
        Version of isNewline that checks type of parent node before calling isNewline(Token)
        Parameters:
        t - - the token in question
        n - - the node containing the token
        Returns:
        true if the token is a new line and the parent is not a ForStatement
